title: Pediatric COVID surge spurs push for vaccination as regulators await trial data
author: Stephen Loiaconi
description: Expectations are rising that young children and toddlers will be eligible to receive COVID-19 vaccines before the end of 2021, easing apprehensions of many parents who have watched pediatric infections climb to record levels in recent weeks, but some uncertainty remains. The start of the new school year has coincided with a surge of COVID-19 cases among children fueled by the delta variant.
